text: Mario Henderson (October 29, 1984 â€“ October 21, 2020) was an American football offensive tackle. He spent the first four years of his career with the Oakland Raiders between 2007 to 2010. He also played for the San Diego Chargers in 2012. Henderson was born in Fort Myers, Florida. Henderson died on October 21, 2020 at the age of 35. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Oakland Raiders players Category:San Diego Chargers players
title: Mario Henderson
